form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Oath or Affirmation of Deponent, NARA Form 1024

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/7/2023 I have stocks and bonds with t) llowing market value, as indicated on the ched list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. $ I have life insurance in the sum of $ With a cash surrender value of $ 100.000.00.- I own real estate valued at $ 52.000.00.- With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ 36.000.00. Which is located at 1701 West 42nd Place, Unit 8, Hialeah, F1. 33012 (Street and Number (City) (State) (Zip Code) 8. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place an "X" in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) Name of Person Wholly Dependent Partially Dependent Age Relationship to Me Francisca Romero X 63 Mother Tarcila I. Romero X 88 Grandmother 9. That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following person(s). If none, state "None" Name Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) Francisca Romero 1979 FOIA (b)(6) 10. That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service on behalf of the following person(s). If none, state none. Name Relationship Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) Francisca Romero Mother 1979 FOIA (b)(6) 11.(Complete this block only if the person named in item 3 will be in the United States temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend, to make specific contributions to the support of the person named in item 3. (If you check "do intend", indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room and board, state for how long and, if money, state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly, or for how long.) That I can guarantee that my Grandmother named in item 3, will not become a public charge if admitted in USA.as Resident. OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT I acknowledge at that I have read Part III of the Instructions, Sponsor and Alien Liability, and am aware of my responsibilities as an immigrant sponsor under the Social Security Act, as amended, and the Food Stamp Act, as amended. I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this affidavit signed by me and the statements are true and correct. Signature of deponent Maria E.QuinteeD Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 20 day of miami may 87 19 Fla NOTARY PUBLIC STATE OF FLORIDA at My commission expires on NY COMMISSION EXP. MAR. 1,1991 Signature of Officer Administering Oath Rosa Severed BONDED THRU GENERAL INS. UAD. Title If affidavit prepared by other than deponent, please complete the following: I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the deponent and is based on all information of which I have knowledge. (Signature) (Address) (Date)
